description: Creates a sync configuration which allows Amazon Web Services to sync content from a Git repository to update a specified Amazon Web Services resource. Parameters for the sync configuration are determined by the sync type.

parameters.name: Branch
parameters.description: The branch in the repository from which changes will be synced.

parameters.name: ConfigFile
parameters.description: The file name of the configuration file that manages syncing between the connection and the repository. This configuration file is stored in the repository.

parameters.name: RepositoryLinkId
parameters.description: The ID of the repository link created for the connection. A repository link allows Git sync to monitor and sync changes to files in a specified Git repository.

parameters.name: ResourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Amazon Web Services resource (for example, a CloudFormation stack in the case of CFN_STACK_SYNC) that will be synchronized from the linked repository.

parameters.name: RoleArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the IAM role that grants permission for Amazon Web Services to use Git sync to update a given Amazon Web Services resource on your behalf.

nested_items.name: SyncConfiguration
nested_items.description: The created sync configuration for the connection. A sync configuration allows Amazon Web Services to sync content from a Git repository to update a specified Amazon Web Services resource.

nested_items.name: Branch
nested_items.description: The branch associated with a specific sync configuration.

nested_items.name: ConfigFile
nested_items.description: The file path to the configuration file associated with a specific sync configuration. The path should point to an actual file in the sync configurations linked repository.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The owner ID for the repository associated with a specific sync configuration, such as the owner ID in GitHub.

nested_items.name: ProviderType
nested_items.description: The connection provider type associated with a specific sync configuration, such as GitHub.

nested_items.name: RepositoryLinkId
nested_items.description: The ID of the repository link associated with a specific sync configuration.

nested_items.name: RepositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the repository associated with a specific sync configuration.

nested_items.name: ResourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the connection resource associated with a specific sync configuration.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role associated with a specific sync configuration.

nested_items.name: SyncType
nested_items.description: The type of sync for a specific sync configuration.

nested_items.name: PublishDeploymentStatus
nested_items.description: Whether to enable or disable publishing of deployment status to source providers.

nested_items.name: TriggerResourceUpdateOn
nested_items.description: When to trigger Git sync to begin the stack update.
